chapters.title: Chapter 29: Homecoming
chapters.info: Neain Aybara, p. 466 (418)—Perrin's aunt, Carlin's widow. She visits her husband's grave every morning. See also Aybara, Adora; Aybara, Carlin; Aybara, Con; Aybara, Deselle; Aybara, Ealsin; Aybara, Eward; Aybara, Joslyn; Aybara, Magde; Aybara, Paetram; Aybara, Perrin.
